name: Mismagius
author: Ayaka Yoshida
flavor_text: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

abilities.name: Twisted Incantation
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may have your opponent shuffle his or her hand into his or her deck and draw a card for each of his or her remaining Prize cards.

attacks.name: Curse Deeply
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.
